name: volt-tackle
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A life-risking tackle that
slightly hurts the user.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A life-risking tackle that
slightly hurts the user.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user throws an
electrified tackle.
It hurts the user
a little.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user electrifies
itself, then charges
at the foe. It causes
considerable damage
to the user as well.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user electrifies itself, then charges. 
It causes considerable damage to the user
and may leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user electrifies itself, then charges.
It causes considerable damage to the user
and may leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:

This also damages the user quite a lot.
This may leave the target with paralysis.
